document_data.caption: A map showing the River Gur in flowing from the Sanrach Mountains.
document_data.name: River Gur
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Gur''' was a small river found in [[Thindol]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]] of [[southwest Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Geography: The River Gur originated in the eastern slopes of the [[Sanrach Mountains]]. The river flowed east, curving near [[Sormarl Pass]], and continued east to empty into the [[Thingulph]] near [[Gurdeth]].
document_data.History: Boat traffic on the river was quite heavy before [[Samarach]] separated from Thindol. The settlements that rose along the River Gur's banks during this time period later fell into disrepair as commerce waned.
